Absolutely! A lot these high powered men lost everything should be given the same rights as any other person who is accused of anything. The right to a fair hearing. Many of the ones in Hollywood did take advantage of their position in the casting of films but was it forced or consensual? Who has not heard of the casting couch? Woman are just as guilty of taking advantage of men in the same way. They, both men and women, want an acting job and go after it any way they can. Now you are hearing about how unfair this practice is. Actually it sounds more like the complainer didn't get the role they were "sacrificing" their bodies for, in other words, sour grapes! "I didn't get what I wanted so I will fix you!" That's what happens when a movement such as "metoo" gets so powerful. It gets corrupted and destroys what it was supposed to help. People like Amber Heard see an opportunity to use the movement for their own personal destructive benefit, to hurt someone. They don't care about all of the actual victims out there. They don't care how much it compromises the reputation of the movement by lying and having the movement take the hit because they backed her. When she is found out to be the abuser, it makes people question the entire movement. It destroys all of the potential good that it can do.
Metoo was supposed to help victims stand up to their abusers, JD did this, and instead got attacked. Metoo should get sued
